item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: March 12, 2023 Today's Verse Psalm 27:14 [14] Wait for the LORD; be strong, and let your heart take courage; wait for the LORD! Today's Memory Verse Matthew 11:28-30 - Come to me, all who labor and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest. Take my yoke upon you, and learn from me, for I am gentle and lowly in heart, and you will find rest for your souls.
